verses.text: \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w this|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* allotment \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*’s \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w son|strong="H1060"\w*, namely \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w and|strong="H4519"\w* father \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Gileadites|strong="H1568"\w*, \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w received|strong="H1961"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* \w and|strong="H4519"\w* \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w this|strong="H1961"\w* allotment \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w rest|strong="H3498"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*—\w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Abiezer,\f + \fr 17:2 \ft Abiezer is a variant of Iezer; see Numbers 26:30.\f* \w Helek|strong="H2507"\w*, Asriel, \w Shechem|strong="H7928"\w*, \w Hepher|strong="H2660"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Shemida|strong="H8061"\w*. These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* other \w male|strong="H2145"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w clans|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Zelophehad|strong="H6765"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hepher|strong="H2660"\w* (\w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Machir|strong="H4353"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*) \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w only|strong="H3588"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*. These \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*: \w Mahlah|strong="H4244"\w*, \w Noah|strong="H5270"\w*, \w Hoglah|strong="H2295"\w*, \w Milcah|strong="H4435"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Tirzah|strong="H8656"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w approached|strong="H7126"\w* Eleazar \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w leaders|strong="H5387"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H6310"\w*, “\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w an|strong="H7126"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w*.” \w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w an|strong="H7126"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*’s \w brothers|strong="H1121"\w*, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w keeping|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w command|strong="H6680"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

Thus \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w shares|strong="H2256"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H3383"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*, \w in|strong="H5307"\w* addition \w to|strong="H3383"\w* \w the|strong="H5676"\w* \w land|strong="H5676"\w* \w of|strong="H2256"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* \w and|strong="H4519"\w* \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5676"\w* \w the|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*,

\w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w received|strong="H5157"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w land|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gilead|strong="H1568"\w* \w belonged|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w rest|strong="H3498"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*.
Now the border of Manasseh went from Asher to Michmethath near Shechem, then southward to include the inhabitants of En-tappuah.
The region of Tappuah belonged to Manasseh, but Tappuah itself, on the border of Manasseh, belonged to Ephraim.

From there the border continued southward to the Brook of Kanah. There were cities belonging to Ephraim among the cities of Manasseh, but the border of Manasseh was on the north side of the brook and ended at the Sea.\f + \fr 17:9 \ft That is, the Mediterranean Sea, also called the Great Sea; also in verse 10\f*
Ephraim’s territory was to the south, and Manasseh’s was to the north, having the Sea as its border and adjoining Asher on the north and Issachar on the east.
Within Issachar and Asher, Manasseh was assigned Beth-shean, Ibleam, Dor (that is, Naphath), Endor, Taanach, and Megiddo, each with their surrounding settlements.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3423"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w unable|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w occupy|strong="H3423"\w* \w these|strong="H2063"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, because \w the|strong="H3423"\w* \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w determined|strong="H2974"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w stay|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* land.

\w However|strong="H3588"\w*, \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w grew|strong="H1121"\w* \w stronger|strong="H2388"\w*, \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w forced|strong="H4522"\w* \w labor|strong="H4522"\w*; \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w failed|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w drive|strong="H3423"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w out|strong="H3423"\w* \w completely|strong="H3423"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, “\w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w only|strong="H5704"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w portion|strong="H2256"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w an|strong="H5414"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*? \w We|strong="H5704"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w because|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w abundantly|strong="H7227"\w*.”

\w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* answered \w them|strong="H5927"\w*, “\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w so|strong="H5927"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w country|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* Ephraim \w is|strong="H8033"\w* \w too|strong="H7227"\w* small \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w clear|strong="H1254"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w yourself|strong="H8033"\w* \w an|strong="H8033"\w* \w area|strong="H2022"\w* \w in|strong="H7227"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Perizzites|strong="H6522"\w* \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Rephaim|strong="H7497"\w*.”

“\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w country|strong="H2022"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w enough|strong="H4672"\w* \w for|strong="H3427"\w* \w us|strong="H4672"\w*,” \w they|strong="H3808"\w* replied, “\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w live|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w valley|strong="H6010"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w*, \w both|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Beth-shean|strong="H1052"\w* \w with|strong="H3427"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w towns|strong="H1323"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Valley|strong="H6010"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* said \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3091"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*—\w to|strong="H1961"\w* Ephraim \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w Manasseh|strong="H4519"\w*—“\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w*. \w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* just \w one|strong="H3808"\w* allotment,

\w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w country|strong="H2022"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* yours \w as|strong="H1961"\w* well. \w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*; \w clear|strong="H1254"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*, \w and|strong="H7393"\w* \w its|strong="H3588"\w* \w farthest|strong="H8444"\w* limits \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* yours. \w Although|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w and|strong="H7393"\w* \w although|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* \w strong|strong="H2389"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* can \w drive|strong="H3423"\w* \w them|strong="H3423"\w* \w out|strong="H3423"\w*.”
